mapper.sql: id, userId, trialType, trialDate, startTime, endTime, createTime, updateTime
mapper.select:
select count(*) from xhx_free_trlal_record
1 = 1
and userId in (${id})
and trialType = #{trialType}
mapper.insert: insert into xhx_free_trlal_record (id, userId, trialType, trialDate, startTime, endTime, createTime, updateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trialType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trialDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update xhx_free_trlal_record
userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trialType = #{trialType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trialDate = #{trialDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update xhx_free_trlal_record set userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trialType = #{trialType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trialDate = #{trialDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(tr.id) from xhx_free_trlal_record tr inner join xhx_user u on u.id=tr.userId
1 = 1
and u.username like "%"#{username}"%"
and tr.trialType = #{trialType}
